lines.text: declare strings called a and b
assign max of abs ( a [ 0 ] - b [ 0 ] ) and abs ( a [ 1 ] - b [ 1 ] ) to the integer loop
lines.code: int loop = max ( abs ( a [ 0 ] - b [ 0 ] ) , abs ( a [ 1 ] - b [ 1 ] ) ) ;

lines.text: print loop and a new line

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < loop ; i ++ )

lines.text: if a [ 0 ] is less than b [ 0 ] , print " R " and increment a [ 0 ]
if a [ 0 ] is greater than b [ 0 ] , print " L " and decrement a [ 0 ]
if a [ 1 ] is less than b [ 1 ] , print " U " and increment a [ 1 ]
if a [ 1 ] is greater than b [ 1 ] , print " D " and decrement a [ 1 ]
